back to main menu

Artifacts

Artifacts are objects that are on dying planets from red stars. All artifacts can be explored at the research station, and contain different amounts of credits, hydrogen, glasses, and drawings. The more players at the same time explores RS, the more their number will be contained on planets Red Stars.

There are 3 main types of artifacts: blue crystals, balls, and tetrahedra, each corresponding to a specific drawing type:

Orb Artifacts contain weapon and shield Blueprints

Blue Crystal Artifacts contain Blueprints for modules that increase efficiency of your Transport and Miner ships

Tetrahedron Artifacts contain support Blueprints
